DOC.brief_summary: This observational placebo-controlled pilot study intend document whether Lyzme5 , over-the-counter ( OTC ) proprietary nutritional supplement product positively impact , ( ) weight , ( b ) cholesterol level man .
DOC.brief_title: Observational Study Lyzme5 Impact Cholesterol Body Weight Man
DOC.detailed_description: Lyzme5 nutritional supplement , accord Dietary Supplement Health Education Act ( DSHEA ) 1994 . It compose B Vitamins along non-essential amino acid . The individual component supplement individually Generally Recognized Safe ( GRAS status ) . The manufacturer 's objective create nutritional supplement would potential positively impact body weight , possibly one lipid value ( i.e. , total cholesterol , LDL , triglyceride ) well , overweight individual may also minimally elevate cholesterol level . This observational clinical study seek recruit 100 volunteer order observe whether weight-loss potential Lyzme5 , previously observe earlier three volunteer , duplicate within large group . The second objective establish whether Lyzme5 positively impact cholesterol level man .
DOC.criteria: At least 21 year age old ; Able read , understanding , signing consent form ; Not pregnant breast feeding ( female ) ; Have normal biomarkers liver kidney function ( determine blood test ) ; Being least 15 lbs ideal weight define Body Mass Index [ BMI ] chart ; Have total cholesterol level excess 200 mg/dl ( determine blood test ) ; Not use illegal substance , include marijuana ( medicinal otherwise ) ; Not use `` recreational drug '' Weighing less 300 lb Under 21 year age ; Mentally impair ; Pregnant breast feeding ; A diabetic ; Having digestion problem ; Problems kidney , heart , liver ; Having , cancer ; Taking prescription ; Weight 300 lb ; Total cholesterol 200 mg/dl ; Using `` recreational '' drug .
